overview: Steve Treviño adds to his comic reputation as “America’s favorite husband” through his fifth stand-up special, I Speak Wife. As the title suggests, Treviño gives an honest take on the day-to-day joy of marriage and living with your best friend, even though she can’t make tamales and wrecked your favorite truck. He juggles dealing with the kid, being his wife’s Instagram photographer, and getting blamed for giving his fathers-in-law a bad gummy bear.
title: Steve Trevino: I Speak Wife
